RawLine: SDM_1103796024,我只知道{color=#FF0000}線索有四條{/color}，分別就刻在這藥王谷{color=#FF0000}四處石碑{/color}上，若是得知所有線索，就能打開這機關了吧。,我只知道{color=#FF0000}线索有四条{/color}，分别就刻在这药王谷{color=#FF0000}四处石碑{/color}上，若是得知所有线索，就能打开这机关了吧。

Items.mt: I only know that there are four clues, which are carved on the four monuments in Yakwang Valley, so if I know all the clues, I can open this mechanism, right?
